findLegalBuilds(Cell, ArrayList<Cell>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController

findLegalMoves(Cell, ArrayList<Cell>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
Returns all the legal moves, applying possible restrictions due to active God Power Cards.
findPossibleBuilds(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can build, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers and domes).
findPossibleBuilds(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.HestiaController
Returns all the Cells where a worker can build, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers and domes), and allows the second build.
findPossibleBuilds(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.ZeusController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can build with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels), including its current position.
findPossibleMoves(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.ApolloController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels) and allows the movement to Cells occupied by opponent Workers.
findPossibleMoves(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.ArtemisController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels) and ensures that, if the Player uses a second move, his Worker won't move back to the Cell it started from.
findPossibleMoves(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels).
findPossibleMoves(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.MinotaurController
Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels).
findPossibleMovesNoUp(Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.PrometheusController
Finds all the possible moves that don't require move up.
